section_title:
15g02 - Failure to include CWHSSA stipulations
in contract.
text:
The failure to incorporate
the CWHSSA stipulations, as set forth in 29 CFR ยง 5.5(b) & 48 CFR ยง 22.305,
into a contract does not preclude CWHSSA coverage.
html: The failure to incorporate the CWHSSA stipulations, as set forth in 29 CFR ยง 5.5(b) & 48 CFR ยง 22.305, into a contract does not preclude CWHSSA coverage.
